name: Original File
summary: Learn about .ORIG files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When creating ORIG files, you should name the file in such a way that it is easy to remember what file type the original file is. For example, when backing up an XML file, you may use the compound extension ".xml.orig" so that you know it is an XML file.
NOTE: Original files also use the .ORI extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
